Text.Page: Have a job for you, soldier. We lose supplies to the Heavens Fall cultists. Every mouthful they eat strengthens them and weakens us! Need you to get back all you can from the {@LinkCreature:17#300551#barrelhead harvesters} east of here. Distasteful, but we have to stop these locusts to survive!
Well done, soldier. Don't forget this lesson: hungry enemies are desperate enemies, and desperation causes mistakes. Just have to keep the pressure on.
Know it's not pleasant, but each cultist you kill is a double victory for us. Done talking.
